mapper.sql: gun_id, pile_num, gun_type, gun_admin_state, gun_charging_state, gun_temp, gun_use_num, gun_power
mapper.insert: insert into t_gun (gun_id, pile_num, gun_type, gun_admin_state, gun_charging_state, gun_temp, gun_use_num, gun_power) values (#{gunId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pileNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gunType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gunAdminState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gunChargingState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gunTemp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gunUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gunPower,jdbcType=INTEGER})

gun_id,

mapper.update:
update t_gun
pile_num = #{pileNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gun_type = #{gunType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gun_admin_state = #{gunAdminState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gun_charging_state = #{gunChargingState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gun_temp = #{gunTemp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gun_use_num = #{gunUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gun_power = #{gunPower,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where gun_id = #{gunId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_gun set pile_num = #{pileNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gun_type = #{gunType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_admin_state = #{gunAdminState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_charging_state = #{gunChargingState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_temp = #{gunTemp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_use_num = #{gunUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_power = #{gunPower,jdbcType=INTEGER} where gun_id = #{gunId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_gun where pile_num=#{pNum} and gun_num=#{gNum}
mapper.update: update t_gun set gun_admin_state = #{gunAdminState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_charging_state = #{gunChargingState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = now() where gun_num = #{gunNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} And pile_num = #{pileNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update t_gun set gun_admin_state = #{gunAdminState}, modify_time = now() where pile_num = #{pileNum}
